meanings.definition: Pornographic material distributed via the internet.
meanings.sent1: The children were warned about cyberporn and told to stay away from inappropriate websites.
meanings.sent2: Some websites have strict filters to prevent cyberporn from being accessed by minors.
meanings.sent3: The cybersecurity expert joked that his biggest challenge was not hackers but cyberporn.
meanings.sent4: In the digital age, cyberporn has become a concerning issue for many parents.
meanings.sent5: The documentary shed light on the dark world of cyberporn and its impact on society.

meanings.definition: To engage in the production or consumption of pornographic material online.
meanings.sent1: He was caught cyberporn-ing late at night when he should have been studying.
meanings.sent2: Some individuals cyberporn as a way to make money from the comfort of their homes.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his guilty pleasure was cyberporn-ing on weekends.
meanings.sent4: She felt a mix of excitement and guilt every time she cyberporn-ed in secret.
meanings.sent5: The artist found inspiration for his work by cyberporn-ing and exploring different visual styles online.
